trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with CloudBees | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with CloudBees | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use CloudBees with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use CloudBees with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with CloudBees
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with CloudBees

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528737).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528737).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and CloudBees.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and CloudBees.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A CloudBees tenant
trans-unit.target: A CloudBees tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to CloudBees will be able to single sign into the application at your CloudBees company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn308586.aspx)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to CloudBees will be able to single sign into the application at your CloudBees company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn308586.aspx)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for CloudBees
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for CloudBees

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for CloudBees
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for CloudBees

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for CloudBees.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for CloudBees.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for CloudBees, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for CloudBees, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **CloudBees**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **CloudBees**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **CloudBees**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **CloudBees**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Cloudbees
trans-unit.target: Cloudbees

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to CloudBees with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to CloudBees with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on for CloudBees requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on for CloudBees requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI).
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI).

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **CloudBees** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **CloudBees** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to CloudBees** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to CloudBees** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **CloudBees Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL used by your user to sign in to CoudBees (e.g.: *https://grandcentral.cloudbees.com/login*", and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **CloudBees Sign On URL** textbox, type your URL used by your user to sign in to CoudBees (e.g.: *https://grandcentral.cloudbees.com/login*", and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at CloudBees** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at CloudBees** page, to download your certificate, click **Download certificate**, and then save the certificate locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your CloudBees company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your CloudBees company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: Click the **SSO integration** tab.
trans-unit.target: Click the **SSO integration** tab.

trans-unit.source: In the **Set Up SAML 2.0 Single Sign On** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **Set Up SAML 2.0 Single Sign On** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Setup Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Setup Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at CloudBees** page, copy the **Remote Login URL** value, and then paste it into the **Remote login URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Configure single sign-on at CloudBees** page, copy the **Remote Login URL** value, and then paste it into the **Remote login URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: Copy the **Thumbprint** value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the **Existing certificate fingerprint** textbox.
trans-unit.target: Copy the **Thumbprint** value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the **Existing certificate fingerprint** textbox.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For more details, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For more details, see [How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value](http://youtu.be/YKQF266SAxI)

trans-unit.source: In the **Authentication domains** textbox, type your company’s domain.
trans-unit.target: In the **Authentication domains** textbox, type your company’s domain.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into **CloudBees**, they must be provisioned into **CloudBees**.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into **CloudBees**, they must be provisioned into **CloudBees**.

trans-unit.source: In the case of **CloudBees**, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of **CloudBees**, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To provision a user account to CloudBees, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To provision a user account to CloudBees, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Log in to your **CloudBees** company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your **CloudBees** company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Go to **Edit Users**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Edit Users**.

trans-unit.source: Users
trans-unit.target: Users

trans-unit.source: Click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: Add
trans-unit.target: Add

trans-unit.source: In the **Add User** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **Add User** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Add User
trans-unit.target: Add User

trans-unit.source: Type the **Email**, **First Name**, **Last Name** and other attributes of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the **Email**, **First Name**, **Last Name** and other attributes of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: Click **Add User**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add User**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]An email with login instructions will be send to the owner of the account.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]An email with login instructions will be send to the owner of the account.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]You can use any other CloudBees user account creation tools or APIs provided by CloudBees to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]You can use any other CloudBees user account creation tools or APIs provided by CloudBees to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to CloudBees, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to CloudBees, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **CloudBees** application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **CloudBees** application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn308586.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn308586.aspx).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
